reviewText: I thought that it was a grew film about a magnificent creature, starkly raises consciousness about why this creature must be brutalized more than any other on the face of the earth, while it is the most spiritual as well.
I love it!!  A+++ goes to this seller.

I recommend this film for anyone who loves animals.  In classical documentary style it brings viewers into the landscape and world of wild horses.  Will they survive the forces that work against them?  This film opens up pandoras box as it  explores possibilities and solutions for conscious stewardship of nature and it's creatures.
This film is about the plight of wild horses in America.  Please watch this film and get involved with efforts to protect these amazing animals.

This movie is not about the beauty of  the wild horse, but about how BLM is destroying them.  An important subject, but not what I was looking for this evening when I found this documentary "for horse lovers"
